terminal-external-models/com.stripe.stripeterminal.external.models/OfflineDetails

OfflineDetails

data class OfflineDetails : Serializable

OfflineDetails holds unique information for a PaymentIntent that was created or processed offline. Useful for relating a forwarded entity to its offline counterpart.

Use of this SDK is subject to the Stripe Terminal Terms: https://stripe.com/terminal/legal

Types

Properties

amountDetails
Link copied to clipboard
val amountDetails: AmountDetails? = null

AmountDetails contains details about items included in the PaymentIntent amount, including tips.

cardPresentDetails
Link copied to clipboard
val cardPresentDetails: OfflineCardPresentDetails? = null

Details about the card-present payment method used to process this PaymentIntent.

requiresUpload
Link copied to clipboard
val requiresUpload: Boolean = true

Set to true if the PaymentIntent needs to be uploaded. PaymentIntents must be uploaded prior to capture.

storedAt
Link copied to clipboard
val storedAt: Date

SDK Date timestamp when the offline entity was stored or "processed".
